42/*
43 * Get info from NDBM map
44 */
45
46#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
47# include <config.h>
48#endif /* HAVE_CONFIG_H */
49#include <am_defs.h>
50#include <amd.h>
51#include <sun_map.h>
52
53/* forward declarations */
54int ndbm_init(mnt_map *m, char *map, time_t *tp);
55int ndbm_mtime(mnt_map *m, char *map, time_t *tp);
56int ndbm_search(mnt_map *m, char *map, char *key, char **pval, time_t *tp);
57
58
59static int
60search_ndbm(mnt_map *m, DBM *db, char *key, char **val)
61{
62 datum k, v;
63
64 k.dptr = key;
65 k.dsize = strlen(key) + 1;
66 v = dbm_fetch(db, k);
67 if (v.dptr) {
68 if (m->cfm && (m->cfm->cfm_flags & CFM_SUN_MAP_SYNTAX))
69 *val = sun_entry2amd(key, v.dptr);
70 else
71 *val = xstrdup(v.dptr);
72 return 0;
73 }
74 return ENOENT;
75}
76
77
78int
79ndbm_search(mnt_map *m, char *map, char *key, char **pval, time_t *tp)
80{
81 DBM *db;
82
83 db = dbm_open(map, O_RDONLY, 0);
84 if (db) {
85 struct stat stb;
86 int error;
87#ifdef DBM_SUFFIX
88 char dbfilename[256];
89
90 xstrlcpy(dbfilename, map, sizeof(dbfilename));
91 xstrlcat(dbfilename, DBM_SUFFIX, sizeof(dbfilename));
92 error = stat(dbfilename, &stb);
93#else /* not DBM_SUFFIX */
94 error = fstat(dbm_pagfno(db), &stb);
95#endif /* not DBM_SUFFIX */
96 if (!error && *tp < stb.st_mtime) {
97 *tp = stb.st_mtime;
98 error = -1;
99 } else {
100 error = search_ndbm(m, db, key, pval);
101 }
102 (void) dbm_close(db);
103 return error;
104 }
105 return errno;
106}
107
108
109int
110ndbm_init(mnt_map *m, char *map, time_t *tp)
111{
112 DBM *db;
113
114 db = dbm_open(map, O_RDONLY, 0);
115 if (db) {
116 struct stat stb;
117 int error;
118#ifdef DBM_SUFFIX
119 char dbfilename[256];
120
121 xstrlcpy(dbfilename, map, sizeof(dbfilename));
122 xstrlcat(dbfilename, DBM_SUFFIX, sizeof(dbfilename));
123 error = stat(dbfilename, &stb);
124#else /* not DBM_SUFFIX */
125 error = fstat(dbm_pagfno(db), &stb);
126#endif /* not DBM_SUFFIX */
127 if (error < 0)
128 *tp = clocktime(NULL);
129 else
130 *tp = stb.st_mtime;
131 dbm_close(db);
132 return 0;
133 }
134 return errno;
135}
136
137
138int
139ndbm_mtime(mnt_map *m, char *map, time_t *tp)
140{
141 return ndbm_init(m,map, tp);
142}
